thread.title: I Stick with Simply The Best
thread.title_full: I Stick with Simply The Best - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: weegram
title: I Stick with Simply The Best
text:
This is the fifth time we have stayed at the Casablanca Hotel.
When you think things can't get better, but they do here, many of the staff remembering us from previous visits and treating as long lost friends, infact it is all down to their professionalism, the doormen, concierge,receptionists,house staff and all who serve breakfast and wine and cheese on an evening.
A big thank you from myself and Christine for making our stay so good again keep up the good work you all are a credit to the Library collection of hotels.
Room Tip: never stayed in a bad room See more room tips
